content:
In software engineering, which of the following best describes the term "refactoring"?
A. It is the process of testing a software application to ensure it functions as expected.
B. It is the process of adding new features or functionality to a software application.
C. It is the process of designing the architecture of a software application.
D. It is the process of documenting the code of a software application.
E. It is the process of restructuring existing computer code without changing its external behavior.
E. It is the process of restructuring existing computer code without changing its external behavior.
